plot: This summer the city is boiling and the only true relief is the local swimming pool. A new immigrant shakes his nerves and takes a dip.
title: Public Swim
plot_es: This summer the city is boiling and the only true relief is the local swimming pool. A new immigrant shakes his nerves and takes a dip.
plot_en: This summer the city is boiling and the only true relief is the local swimming pool. A new immigrant shakes his nerves and takes a dip.
